com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject

Class Colour

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject.Filter
      • com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject.Colour

  • public class Colour
extends Filter
    This class applies colour filters to the bitmap.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.example.alarvet.seguin_larvet_androidproject.Filter

        height, width

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeTint(int hue, float saturation, float value)
      This method applies a color filter.
      void grayAndTint(int tint)
      This method applies a gray filter to every pixels but the one that are within the range of the selected color (tint).
      void sepia()
      This method applies a sepia filter by doing a weighted average of R, G and B on R, G and B.
      void toGray()
      This method applies a gray filter by calculating the weighted average of R, G and B for each pixels.

        public Colour(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp)

    • Method Detail

      • toGray

        public void toGray()
        This method applies a gray filter by calculating the weighted average of R, G and B for each pixels.

      • grayAndTint

        public void grayAndTint(int tint)
        This method applies a gray filter to every pixels but the one that are within the range of the selected color (tint).
        Parameters:
        tint - int between 0 and 350 (bound the hue of the color)

      • changeTint

        public void changeTint(int hue,
                       float saturation,
                       float value)
        This method applies a color filter. The color is bound to the parameters : the applied color HSV is (hue, saturation, value).
        Parameters:
        hue - int between 0 and 359
        saturation - float between 0 and 1
        value - float between 0 and 1

      • sepia

        public void sepia()
        This method applies a sepia filter by doing a weighted average of R, G and B on R, G and B.
